00007 using System;
00008 using System.Collections.Generic;
00009 using System.Text;
00010 using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
00011 using System.Drawing;
00012 
00013 namespace Microsoft.Drawing
00014 {
00015     // These structures, enumerations and p/invoke signatures come from
00016     // wingdi.h in the Windows Mobile 5.0 Pocket PC SDK
00017 
00018     public struct BlendFunction
00019     {
00020         public byte BlendOp;
00021         public byte BlendFlags;
00022         public byte SourceConstantAlpha;
00023         public byte AlphaFormat;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public enum BlendOperation : byte
00027     {
00028         AC_SRC_OVER = 0x00
00029     }
00030 
00031     public enum BlendFlags : byte
00032     {
00033         Zero = 0x00
00034     }
00035 
00036     public enum SourceConstantAlpha : byte
00037     {
00038         Transparent = 0x00,
00039         Opaque = 0xFF
00040     }
00041 
00042     public enum AlphaFormat : byte
00043     {
00044         AC_SRC_ALPHA = 0x01
00045     }
00046 
00047     public enum TernaryRasterOperations : uint
00048     {
00050         SRCCOPY = 0x00CC0020,
00052         SRCPAINT = 0x00EE0086,
00054         SRCAND = 0x008800C6,
00056         SRCINVERT = 0x00660046,
00058         SRCERASE = 0x00440328,
00060         NOTSRCCOPY = 0x00330008,
00062         NOTSRCERASE = 0x001100A6,
00064         MERGECOPY = 0x00C000CA,
00066         MERGEPAINT = 0x00BB0226,
00068         PATCOPY = 0x00F00021,
00070         PATPAINT = 0x00FB0A09,
00072         PATINVERT = 0x005A0049,
00074         DSTINVERT = 0x00550009,
00076         BLACKNESS = 0x00000042,
00078         WHITENESS = 0x00FF0062
00079     }
00080 
00081     public class PlatformAPIs
00082     {
00083         [DllImport("coredll.dll")]
00084         extern public static Int32 AlphaBlend(IntPtr hdcDest, Int32 xDest, Int32 yDest, Int32 cxDest, Int32 cyDest, IntPtr hdcSrc, Int32 xSrc, Int32 ySrc, Int32 cxSrc, Int32 cySrc, BlendFunction blendFunction);
00085 
00086         [DllImport("coredll.dll")]
00087         public static extern bool BitBlt(IntPtr hObject, int nXDest, int nYDest, int nWidth,
00088            int nHeight, IntPtr hObjSource, int nXSrc, int nYSrc, TernaryRasterOperations dwRop);    
00089 
00090         public static void DrawAlpha(Graphics gx, Bitmap image, byte transp, int x, int y)
00091         {
00092             using (Graphics gxSrc = Graphics.FromImage(image))
00093             {
00094                 IntPtr hdcDst = gx.GetHdc();
00095                 IntPtr hdcSrc = gxSrc.GetHdc();
00096                 BlendFunction blendFunction = new BlendFunction();
00097                 blendFunction.BlendOp = (byte)BlendOperation.AC_SRC_OVER;   // Only supported blend operation
00098                 blendFunction.BlendFlags = (byte)BlendFlags.Zero;           // Documentation says put 0 here
00099                 blendFunction.SourceConstantAlpha = transp;// Constant alpha factor
00100                 blendFunction.AlphaFormat = (byte)0;                        // Don't look for per pixel alpha
00101                 PlatformAPIs.AlphaBlend(hdcDst, x, y, image.Width, image.Height, hdcSrc, 0, 0, image.Width, image.Height, blendFunction);
00102                 gx.ReleaseHdc(hdcDst);    // Required cleanup to GetHdc()
00103                 gxSrc.ReleaseHdc(hdcSrc);       // Required cleanup to GetHdc()
00104             }
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }
